title: Arma.III.Digital.Deluxe.Edition.Repack-z10yded
description:
Arma.III.Digital.Deluxe.Edition.Repack-z10yded

Year: 2013
Genre: Action (Tactical / Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person / 3rd Person
Publication Type: Repack
Language: Russian / English / French / Italian / German / Spanish / Polish / Czech / Portuguese
Language: English
Medicine: 3DM

System requirements:

OS: Windows Vista SP2 and Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (XP not supported)
Processor: Intel dual-core processor with a clock of 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon dual-core processor with a clock frequency of 2.5 GHz
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT, AMD Radeon HD 3830 or Intel HD Graphics 4000 with 512 MB VRAM
DirectX : 10
Hard Drive: 10 GB HD space

Description:

ARMA 3 - a new milestone in the genre of tactical military simulation from independent 
studio Bohemia Interactive, creators of the acclaimed Operation Flashpoint. 

ARMA 3 absorbed all the best from the previous games in the series and has introduced 
many innovations. New physics engine allows the player to control the unprecedented 
realism fighting. The new model of behavior technology, the broadest range of weapons, 
from the already become classic M16 and AK74 before prototypes are not yet enrolled 
in a wide use, as well as the long-awaited series of fans the opportunity to swim under 
water. 

After several years of exhausting war, Europe has become the last refuge of the battles 
weakened NATO. Stratis island captured by the enemy on the Middle East and it will gain 
guaranteed superiority of NATO in the region. Operation has begun, "Magnitude": a small 
group of specially trained soldiers with scientists undercover sent to the island in the 
Mediterranean Sea. Mission in danger of collapse! The team is almost completely destroyed, 
and the main character, Captain Scott Miller washed ashore enemy island. Complete the 
operation in his power, but his way there all the dangers of modern warfare, ruthless 
environment and numerical superiority of the enemy. Ponder will have every step!

Features repack
- Release is based on Arma III Digital Deluxe Edition *
- Cut: nothing
- Recoded: nothing
- Game Version: 1.14.116.248 (Update 12)
- Setup time: ~ 9 min 

- Episodes of the single player campaign:
+ Survival (Survive)
+ Adapt (Adapt)
+ Win (Win) 

* Digital bonuses Bonus folder in a folder with the distribution. 

- Author repack - z10yded
